original_title: Imperium - Vespasian: The Path to Power
overview: Vespasian, one of the Roman Empireâ€™s finest emperors remains largely unknown, yet his reign in 1st century AD transitioned a weakening Empire into a period of stability and growth that was the legacy of the other great emperors Trajan, Hadrian, Marcus Aurelius and Septimius Severus. Vespasian ultimately saved Rome from disaster and made possible the Golden Age of the 2nd century AD.
title: Imperium - Vespasian: The Path to Power
